1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Storms have left Newlyn and Brixham's fishing fleet stuck in harbour. But one intrepid skipper heads out to try and cash in on record fish prices. Will others follow his lead?

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: The Filadelphia and its skipper Don Liddocoat head out after a frustrating six months in dock. But when the engine fails as a storm closes in, there's a rush to save them.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: It's Christmas and time for the Newlyn and Brixham to crown their top grossing skippers. And the Navy search and rescue team attend a Spanish sailor in anaphylactic shock.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: A fire has caused the Trevessa trawler to dump Â£30,000 worth of nets into the ocean. Can Skipper Steve of the Billy Rowney retrieve them despite increasingly stormy weather?

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Scott Liddicoat is given a last chance by skipper Roger Knowles. But after a fish throwing incident he regrets his decision. Is this the end for Scott's career as a fisherman?

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: The crews head further afield as the season comes to an end to bag bumper catches. Who'll come out on top? And the Navy helicopter rescues a fisherman with a hook in his eye.

imdb.plot outline: Two of Britain's biggest fishing fleets, Brixham and Newlyn, are locked in battle in the seas around the southern edge of the country. With only Search and Rescue squadrons to protect them, the fleets are in a fight to land the biggest catch, a fight to stay out in the worst weather, and when disaster strikes, a fight just to stay alive.
imdb.title: Trawler Wars
plot: Two of Britain's biggest fishing fleets, Brixham and Newlyn, are locked in battle in the seas around the southern edge of the country. With only Search and Rescue squadrons to protect them, the fleets are in a fight to land the biggest catch, a fight to stay out in the worst weather, and when disaster strikes, a fight just to stay alive.
